Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Establishes the position of an insurance liaison on the disaster preparedness commission
Summary: Establishes the position of an insurance liaison on the disaster preparedness commission to be appointed by the governor and serve as a non-voting member.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the establishment of an insurance liaison on the disaster preparedness commission
